tool_description: Able to read server data from all V Rising servers, including online players.
name: V Rising - SourceQuery server
title: V Rising - SourceQuery server

api_list.name: All Data
api_list.description: This will return all data from the server.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://v-rising-sourcequery-server.p.rapidapi.com/api/23.109.103.20/29815"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "v-rising-sourcequery-server.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://v-rising-sourcequery-server.p.rapidapi.com/api/{host}/{port}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "v-rising-sourcequery-server.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
